sentences.en: Both players have been suffering from niggling injuries.
sentences.cn: 两名运动员一直在忍受轻微的伤痛。

sentences.en: EXAMPLE: The impatient boss angers his employees by arguing with them over niggling little details.
sentences.cn: 这位不耐烦的老板为鸡毛蒜皮的小事与员工争论,惹恼了他们.

sentences.en: I don't see why they should be niggling over paying a few pounds into the fund.
sentences.cn: 我不明白他们为什么对这笔基金投入几镑钱而如此在乎.

sentences.en: I work hard and I always train even if I've got a niggling injury.
sentences.cn: 我很努力,即便有点小伤也还坚持训练.

sentences.en: It's been niggling at my mind ever since I met Neville in Nice.
sentences.cn: 自从在尼斯见到内维尔后，我一直忐忑不安。

sentences.en: Petty niggling, mean tricks , bureaucracy, and Ah Q - ism are of no use at all.
sentences.cn: 打小算盘,弄小智术, 官僚主义, 阿Q主义,实际上毫无用处.

sentences.en: She had niggling doubts about their relationship.
sentences.cn: 她时常对他们的关系有一丝疑虑。

sentences.en: She still felt the same niggling doubt: was he really telling the truth?
sentences.cn: 她仍然无法消除萦绕心头的疑虑: 他真的说实话了 吗 ?

sentences.en: Stop niggling about every penny we spend.
sentences.cn: 别再为我们花的每个小钱费心思了.

sentences.en: The matter is too small to be worth niggling over.
sentences.cn: 小小不言的事,不必计较.

sentences.en: The tutorial investor is not after control , but he wants to guide you on niggling issue.
sentences.cn: 在他给你开支票钱, 你也许感觉他是个慈善的导师.

trans.tran_cn: 不断烦扰的，（一件工作）费神的，难办的，繁琐的
